meanings.sent1: I will reoffer the toy to my friend.
meanings.sent2: She decided to reoffer her help to the neighbor.
meanings.sent3: The magician will reoffer the disappearing act for the audience.
meanings.sent4: The teacher reoffered the extra credit opportunity to the students.
meanings.sent5: He reoffered his apology with sincerity.

meanings.definition: To make a new offer of.
meanings.sent1: They will reoffer the discount on the car.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to reoffer the job position to other candidates.
meanings.sent3: The store will reoffer the limited edition item for sale.
meanings.sent4: She reoffered her friendship to the new student.
meanings.sent5: The chef reoffered the special dish due to popular demand.
